clips.Description: clep nziza y’amajwi itasha abanyagihugu kuyumviriza cane.
clips.Goal: amajwi apanze atanu abantu bategera ubwonyene bimwe mubigize inkuru.
clips.Tip: Mushobora kuba mukeneye ko micro iguma hafi yo gufata amajwi.Suzuma aho mukura ijwi hafashe neza.
clips.Title: umukono

clips.Description: Amajwi ankure ya clip y’amajwi afashe abayumva gutegera ukuntu umuntu n’ibidukikije bikorane, bihanahasa.
clips.Goal: Fasha abantu gutegera ahao wakuye ijwi ,aho abo mwayaze bari.
clips.Tip: Amajwi ari ture ya clip araterera mu gushikiriza inkuru.Iyo hari amajwi atajanye n’inkuru ashobora gusamaza.

clips.Description: Erega abantu umuntu inkuru yawe ihagazeko.
clips.Goal: Muufata ariko arigira, aravuga intangamarara canke mumufate mukumusigura.
clips.Tip: Gira iyo clip ngufi: gusa sigurira uyo muntu abakurikira canke umufashe yivuje.Fata n’ibirengako ukeneye
